MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Henderson Street and Yardheads. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:49pm. Our engineers are on their way to Cable wynd Substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8pm on the 30th November 2020.
